from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

c = Counter(s)

ans = n - sum(c.values()) // 2

print(ans)
from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

c = Counter(s)

ans = n - sum(c.values())

print(ans)


from collections import Counter 

n = int(input()) 
s = input()

counter = 0

for i in Counter(s).values():
    counter += i - 1

print(counter)

n = int(input())
s = input()

print(sum([i - 1 for i in Counter(s).values()]))
